In case none of you ever read the message board at the NBWRPG website 
i decided to post it here too.
I will soon be returning do to the fact that i have lots of time on 
my hands now. I will not be using my old characters Inferno,etc but a 
whole new group of five characters. I do not know the exact date i 
will rejoin but it will be soon. however, if i think that the rpg has 
just become stupid and is full of a bunch of idiots (no offense to 
anyone) or that i can't keep i will leave again. If you wish to talk 
to me about this or get more details e-mail me directly not through 
the egroup or AIM me.
Inferno
